technical term: A technical term refers to a specialized word or phrase that is used within a particular field or industry to convey complex ideas or concepts. It is an expert vocabulary that enables communication among people with similar knowledge and training, often used in professional or academic settings.
kitkat: A "kitKat" refers to a specific type of chocolate bar with a crispy wafer interior covered in milk chocolate. It is an internationally recognized brand and a popular confectionery product.
Charpo: A "Charpo" refers to a person who is dead or has died, but is no longer visible or apparent, often due to being buried or having been cremated. In this context, the phrase suggests that the individual has passed away without anyone noticing or leaving any signs of their presence.
